titleStmt.title: The tryal of patience being a relation of a widdow in York-shire who having buried her husband and left seven small children was reduc'd to great poverty and turn'd out of house and home, then going to her husbands brother, being a rich man, in hopes of finding relief but instead thereof he threatened them with cruelty : with an account of a ladies love at the greatest time of here distress tune of In summer time.
